title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker, supports RAG, multi-user, themes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: TUI wrapper around Ollama written in Go; interactive model/chat management in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin friendly, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, fine-tune, multimodal, LangGraph, etc.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama; simple DSL for chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with LINQ-style chat builders and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for integration tests.

title: ollama-rustico
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI that wraps ollama-rs with prompt templates and shell piping.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama; zero-dependency HTTP implementation.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that auto-detects local Ollama server and adds voice input/output.
